text: Kapena iwo amati, “Wapeka yekha?” Nena, “Ngati ine ndapeka ndekha, inu mulibe mphamvu yonditeteza ine kwa Mulungu. Iye ali kudziwa bwino chilichonse chimene mumanena chokhudza chimenechi. Iye ndi wokwana kukhala mboni pakati pa ine ndi inu ndipo Iye ndi wokhululukira ndiponso Mwini chisoni chosatha.”
